changes.description: Initial release of YOQR - Complete QR code generator and scanner platform
Advanced QR code customization with colors, patterns, logos, and effects
Real-time QR code preview with instant download and copy functionality
Camera-based QR code scanning with continuous scan mode
Support for multiple QR code types (URL, Text, WiFi, Contact, Email, SMS, Geo, Phone)
Privacy-focused design with no data collection
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Modern UI with dark/light theme support
SEO optimized with proper meta tags and sitemap
